DOC.brief_summary: Background . Tension-type headache ( TTH ) common form primary headache real problem subject suffer . Until , physiotherapy treatment include different technique combine together , without establish effective . Objective . The purpose study know effectiveness manipulative manual therapy treatment , regard pain perception neck mobility patient tension-type headache . Methods : A double-blind , randomize clinical trial conduct , 84 patient diagnose tension-type headache , divide three treatment group -manual therapy , manipulative therapy , combination techniques- , placebo control group . Four treatment session administer four week , post-treatment assessment , follow-up one month . Cervical range motion assess ( CROM device ) , well pain perception ( McGill Pain Questionnaire ) , frequency intensity headache ( weekly register ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Treatment Tension-type Headache With Manual Manipulative Therapy
